content.raw: @chapulina It would be very useful if the reharnessing went into the initial startup pose rather than the last position before a fall.  Most of the time, Val falls when she gets into some weird position.  It's unfortunate that the reharnessing puts her back into the same weird position.  This would also help with the feet being too close or overlapping on reharness.
